onboarding.step2.models.help: Embeddings are like fingerprints for words or data. They help computers understand similarities and differences between them, making tasks like understanding language or recognizing patterns easier for machines.
onboarding.step2.models.languages-help: We will apply the semantic model that works best for the language(s) used in most of your data.
